entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Makkovik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -5.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Makkovik Airport 3:00 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -5.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -8.3°C
Wind: NNW 41 km/h gust 72 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Clearing. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Thursday 19 January 2023
